items.title: Deno 1.0
items.description: Deno is a secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript and an alternative to node.js.

items.title: JSNation
items.description: A 2-day JavaScript conference to stay up-to-date on the latest JS tech. It has a free Ticket.

items.title: Modern CSS Solutions
items.description: A cool series of articles by Stephanie Eckles on solving old CSS problems with modern CSS.

items.title: quicklink
items.description: A drop-in solution for sites to prefetch links based on what is in the user's viewport.

items.title: Animista
items.description: A collection of ready to use CSS animations you can play around with online.

items.title: Treact
items.description: Free Modern React Templates for every need.

items.title: styco
items.description: A VS Code plugin to transform JSX-Tags with style-props to styled components.

items.title: Tiny helpers
items.description: A collection of free single-purpose online tools for web developers.

items.title: Real-Time Debugging
items.description: An extension for VS Code that visualizes how a program is being executed in real time.

items.title: WebGL guide
items.description: A complete, summarized WebGL tutorial with interactive demos.

items.title: React Native for Windows + macOS
items.description: React Native adds support for the Windows 10 SDK as well as the macOS 10.12 SDK.
